Package com.example.eventmaster

package com.example.eventmaster
  • Class
    Description
    AccessToken
    Class used to retrieve the current access token for sending notifications.
    AdminActivity
    Displays the Main Admin panel Used to navigate to all datatypes (events, profiles, images, facilities, qrcode)
    AdminActivityTest
    Tests the AdminActivityTest class
    AdminEventActivity
    Displays all of the events that have been created
    AdminEventActivityTest
    Runs tests on AdminEventActivity class
    AdminFacilitiesActivity
    Displays all of the facilities that have been created
    AdminFacilitiesActivityTest
    Runs tests on AdminEventActivity class
    AdminImagesActivity
    Displays all of the images that have been created
    AdminImagesActivityTest
    Runs test on AdminProfileActivity
    AdminLoginActivity
    Displays the Admin Login screen Ensures the person accessing admin privileges has the correct login information
    AdminLoginActivityTest
    Tests things in AdminLoginActivity
    AdminProfileActivity
    Displays all of the profiles that have been created
    AdminProfileActivityTest
    Runs test on AdminProfileActivity
    AdminQRActivity
    Displays all of the facilities that have been created
    AdminQRActivityTest
    Runs test on AdminProfileActivity
    AppInfoActivity
    Displays various pieces of information about the EventMaster app.
    CreateEventActivity
    CreateEventActivity.java This activity allows users to create an event by filling in details such as event name, description, capacity, waitlist options, and a countdown timer.
    CreateEventActivityTest
    Runs UI tests for creating an event
    EditFacilityScreen
    Gives the user EditText views to edit their personal Facility.
    EditFacilityTest
    Runs UI tests on the EditFacilityScreen
    EditProfileTest
    Tests for the InputUserInformation class (edit profile screen)
    Entrant
    Class created so the Event class will work.
    Event
    The Event class represents a single event on the app.
    EventAdapter
    Adapter class for managing and binding event data to RecyclerView.
    EventAdapter.EventViewHolder
    ViewHolder class for each event item, holding views for event name and description.
    EventDetailsActivity
    Activity to display detailed information about a specific event, including event name, description, QR code, and event poster image.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    Facility
    The Facility class represents a single event on the app.
    FacilityScreen
    Displays the name, address and description for the user's facility Allows navigation to creation of an event, viewing events, and editing facility
    FacilityScreenTest
    Runs UI tests on the FacilityScreen
    FacilityUnitTest
    Test class for the Facility class.
    FCMNotificationSender
    Class used to create and send a notification to another user.
    FirestoreCallback<T>
    Due to the request to the database being asynchronous, I implemented a "callback" interface.
    Image
    The Image class provides functionality for managing and changing a profile picture.
    InputUserInformation
    Class for user to enter all their personal information, name, email, phone number(optional), profile picture
    JoinedEventDetailsActivity
    This class displays the event information and title for the event that the user has been accepted to
    JoinedEventsActivity
    Initializes the Joined Events Screen Shows a list of the events that an entrant has been accepted to
    JoinedEventsTest
    Tests for the JoinedEventsActivity class
    JoinEventScreen
    Displays a recycler view of all the events that are created in EventMaster Allows the entrant to click on any event
    JoinEventTest
    Tests for the JoinEventScreen class
    JoinWaitlistScreen
    Initializes the screen telling an entrant they have successfully joined the waitlist
    MainActivity
    MainActivity acts as the home screen for the app, and is the starting point where all other navigation follows from.
    MainActivityTest
    Tests the MainActivity class (home screen)
    MapActivity
    Opens google map to display entrant locations for an event
    MessagingService
    Receives notifications from firebase messaging
    ModeActivity
    The ModeActivity class manages the app's theme settings (light or dark mode) based on user preferences.
    NotificationActivityTest
    UI tests for the Notification class
    NotificationAttendeesActivity
    NotificationAttendeesActivity handles the display of a notification for being an attendee for an event.
    NotificationInvitedActivity
    NotificationInvitedActivity handles user interactions with an event invitation.
    NotificationRejectedActivity
    NotificationRejectedActivity handles the display of a notification for being reject from an event.
    Notifications
    The Notifications class represents the activity for displaying notifications within the app.
    NotificationsAdapter
    Adapter for displaying notifications in a RecyclerView.
    NotificationsAdapter.EventViewHolder
    ViewHolder class for holding event data.
    NotificationsAdapter.OnNotificationClickListener
    Interface for handling notification clicks.
    NotificationWaitlistActivity
    NotificationWaitlistActivity handles the display of a notification for being waitlisted from an event.
    OrganizerEventListView
    OrganizerEventListView class handles the event details screen for event organizers.
    Profile
    The Profile class represents the user's profile information.
    ProfileActivity
    The ProfileActivity class represents the user's profile screen in the app.
    ProfileActivityTest
    Tests the ProfileActivity class (profile screen)
    ProfilePicture
    ProfilePicture provides methods to manage a user's profile picture, either by loading it from SharedPreferences or generating a default profile picture
    QrCaptureActivity
    The QrCaptureActivity class customizes the barcode scanning activity to ensure the scanner is always displayed in a vertical orientation.
    QRScanFragment
    The QRScanFragment class handles QR code scanning functionality and related user interactions.
    QRScannerActivity
    Opens QR Scanner from navigation bar
    RecyclerViewItemCountAssertion
    This class is used in UI tests to assert if recycler views contain the correct number of items
    retrieveEventInfo
    Initializes the Event Information Screen Allows entrant to join waitlist notifying firebase Notifies Event's 'waitlist list' of the user that joined specific event
    SettingsScreen
    Displays the settings screen Links the setting screen to the Admin Login screen and the App Info screen
    SettingsTest
    Tests the SettingsScreen class (settings screen)
    ToastMatcher
    Custom matcher to verify if a Toast message is displayed.
    UnjoinWaitlistScreen
    This class displays the event information and title and a button allowing the entrant to leave the waitlist
    UserUnitTest
    Test class for the User class.
    ViewAttendeesListActivity
    Activity for viewing a sampled list of entrants who have been accepted to an event.
    ViewCreatedEventsActivity
    Activity that allows the user to view and manage events they have created.
    ViewDeclinedListActivity
    Activity for viewing a sampled list of entrants who have been declined to an event.
    ViewEventsAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying the list of events in a RecyclerView Each item in the list corresponds to a specific event with its details
    ViewEventsAdapter.EventViewHolder
    Holds events for ViewEventsAdapter
    ViewFacilitiesAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying the list of images in a RecyclerView Each item in the list corresponds to an image
    ViewImagesAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying the list of images in a RecyclerView Each item in the list corresponds to an image
    ViewInvitedListActivity
    Activity for viewing a sampled list of entrants who have been invited to an event.
    ViewInvitedListTest
    Runs UI tests on the ViewInvitedListActivity
    ViewJoinedEventsAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying the waitlisted events of an entrant in a RecyclerView
    ViewQRAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying the list of profiles in a RecyclerView Each item in the list corresponds to a profile with its profile details
    ViewRejectedListActivity
    Activity for viewing a sampled list of entrants who have been rejected to an event.
    ViewRejectedListTest
    Runs UI tests on the ViewRejectedListActivity
    ViewWaitlistActivity
    ViewWaitlistActivity is responsible for displaying the waitlist for a specific event in a Firebase-backed application.
    ViewWaitlistTest
    Runs UI tests on the ViewWaitlistActivity
    WaitlistedEventsActivity
    The activity represents the screen that displays a list of all the waitlisted events that belong to an entrant
    WaitlistedEventsAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying the waitlisted events of an entrant in a RecyclerView
    WaitlistedEventsTest
    Tests for the JoinedEventsActivity class
    WaitlistUsersAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying waitlisted users in a RecyclerView.
    WaitlistUsersAdapter.User
    User class to hold the details of a user including name and profile picture URL.
